'''1.21.84''' is a hotfix for ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' released on June 5, 2025 for Xbox and servers only. It fixes a critical bug where exiting a world on Xbox can cause it to disappear from the [[Select World|world list]].<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/37160753929741-Minecraft-1-21-84-Xbox-Only|title=Minecraft - 1.21.84 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=June 5, 2025}}</ref>
